alert.note: Alert for Lexington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lexington County through 300 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Red Bank, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Springdale, Oak Grove, Red Bank, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market, Columbia Metro Airport, West Columbia Riverwalk, Pelion, Lexington County Airport At Pelion, Lexington Acres Pond, Peachtree Rock, Edmund, Cayce Riverwalk and Silver Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 42 and 59. Interstate 26 between mile markers 109 and 120. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
